posts.title: 读书笔记
posts.text: 对阅读过书籍/论文做一个记录，温故而知新 认知 《财富自由之路》 《把时间当做朋友》 《重来(Rework)》 《重来(Rework)2》 《自控力》 《暗时间》 历史 《激荡三十年上》 《激荡三十年下》 《国史大纲下》 商业 《从0到1》 《精益数据分析》 金融 《彼得林奇的成功投资》 《穷爸爸富爸爸》 生物 《硬派健身》 物理 《上帝掷骰子么》 计算机 《局部敏感哈希与文本去重》 Big Data 《kylin初体验》 《kylin-modrian-saiku整合》 NLPMust Read 《Attention is all you need》 《Beyond Accuracy: Behavioral Testing of NLP Models with CheckList》 Survey 《A Survey on Deep Learning for Named Entity Recognition》 《A Survey on Open Information Extraction》 Information Extraction 《Matching the Blanks: Distributional Similarity for Relation Learning》 《Neural Open Information Extraction》 《KG-BERT: BERT for Knowledge Graph Completion》 《Supervised Open Information Extraction》 《TPLinker: Single-stage Joint Extraction of Entities and Relations Through Token Pair Linking》 Generative Model 《Improving Language Understandingby Generative Pre-Training》 《Text Generation from Knowledge Graphs with Graph Transformers》 《GPT-based Generation for Classical Chinese Poetry》Recommendation 《DKN: Deep Knowledge-Aware Network for News Recommendation》 BestPaper 《Vocabulary Learning cia Optimal Transport for Neural Machine Translation》

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
